TEXT.TITLE: WALLACE COMPUTER <WCS> BUY OFFICE PRODUCTS FIRM
TEXT.BODY: Wallace Computer Services Inc said it acquired for 12 mln dlrs in cash and industrial revenue bonds, certain assets of Rockwell-Barnes Inc, a Chicago-based office products company. Reuter
